articles.description: A new report from the British Film Institute (BFI) reveals that film and high end TV tax breaks have resulted in the highest ever return on investment in the U.K. The report, which covers the pre-pandemic period from 2017-2019, calculated that tax reliefs acr…
articles.content:
A new report from the British Film Institute (BFI) reveals that film and high end TV tax breaks have resulted in the highest ever return on investment in the U.K.

articles.author: Brogan-Leigh Hurst
articles.title: Antiques Roadshow guest speechless as rare diamond ring bought for £1 soars in value - The Mirror
articles.description: A woman who appeared on Antiques Roadshow couldn't believe her ears when John Benjamin told her a ring she had purchased for £1 from the local charity shop was worth £2,000
articles.content:
A guest on tonight's episode of Antiques Roadshow was left completely lost for words when her ordinary ring, purchased from a charity shop for £1, soared in value.
The woman was speaking to John Ben… [+2289 chars]

articles.author: Jo Tweedy
articles.title: Marcus Rashford and Tom Kerridge create £10 Christmas dinner for six - Daily Mail
articles.description: The striker, 24, and TV chef, 48, say the turkey roll and traybaked veggies dish will feed six. Rashford received an MBE in November for leading the fight against child poverty.
articles.content:
Manchester United star Marcus Rashford has joined forces with Tom Kerridge to create a Christmas dinner that will feed six people - with a leftover Boxing Day dish - for just £10.
